short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display language pair subtitles for Youtube Videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ROOSTER YOUTUBE TOOLS FOR LINGQ
Extra features for language learners when watching videos on Youtube

Features
→ Dual subtitles (Can display subtitles in any language pair)
→ Subtitle Syncing (Displayed captions are synced to the original Audio, no matter what language is spoken)
→ Improved parsing of AutoGenerated subs
→ Simple menu to load subtitles (Turn off the native Youtube captions while using this)
→ Query word translation data from Language Reactor (GPT / Machine learning)
